title: Add food photos to catalog cards

requirements.text: Update the FoodItem type in backend/main.mo to include an optional imageUrl field of type ?Text to store the URL or path to the food photo

quotes: Can you add one photo of the food along with its name

acceptanceCriteria: Existing seedRealData function populates imageUrl for all food items with appropriate image paths

requirements.text: Modify the FoodCard component in frontend/src/components/FoodCard.tsx to display the food photo above the food name when imageUrl is available, using an img element with appropriate styling that matches the warm earth tone design

quotes: Can you add one photo of the food along with its name

acceptanceCriteria: Food photo is displayed prominently on each card when available
Photo has proper aspect ratio and responsive sizing
Fallback UI is shown if imageUrl is not provided
Photo styling integrates seamlessly with the existing card design

requirements.text: Add an imageUrl field to the UploadRecipeForm component in frontend/src/components/UploadRecipeForm.tsx, allowing users to optionally provide an image URL when submitting new recipes

quotes: Can you add one photo of the food along with its name

acceptanceCriteria: Image URL input field is added to the form
Field is clearly labeled and optional
Form submission includes imageUrl value when provided

requirements.text: Render the generated food photos as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated/ directory and reference them in the FoodCard component using relative paths
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are properly referenced in FoodCard
Images load correctly from the static assets directory
No backend routing is used for serving generated images

constraints: Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui directory
Maintain the single-actor architecture in backend/main.mo
Preserve the existing warm earth tone design palette (terracotta, sage green, cream)
Keep all Motoko logic in the main actor file
nonGoals: Adding image editing or cropping features
Creating a gallery view for food photos

required: Appetizing photo of Spanish churros with chocolate dipping sauce (churros.dim_400x300.png)
Colorful photo of Japanese mochi ice cream balls in various flavors (mochi-ice-cream.dim_400x300.png)
Photo of Canadian Timbits donut holes in assorted flavors (timbits.dim_400x300.png)
Golden Portuguese pastel de nata custard tarts (pastel-de-nata.dim_400x300.png)
Photo of bubble tea with tapioca pearls and straw (bubble-tea.dim_400x300.png)
